Room.Name: Northwest Oceancrest Postoffice
Room.ShortDescription: You are in one of the largest post offices in the Oceancrest mail system.
Room.LongDescription: Mail clerks scurry around you pushing great carts of mail in all directions. Of course, if you really want your mail to go through quickly, you will not depend on hand delivered mail. The faster method is to simply use the command: sendmail <person>.
